title: minor
content: as a CSE major, should i take a minor in electronics or any other branch?

comments.body: Nope, not in ECE atleast. ECE Minors are useless

It depends on your interests. If you are interested in ECE then sure take up a Minors in ECE - likewise for other branches. There is no need as such. If you are aiming for an IT job, then a Minors in ECE does not help.
